data.title: Vanderlande
data.meta_description: Vanderlande is a market-leading, global partner for future-proof logistic process automation in the warehousing, airports and parcel sectors.
data.text:
Vanderlande publishes Sustainability Report FY2024

Vanderlande has published its latest annual sustainability report, which covers the company’s activities and performance during FY2024. The report details the steps that have been taken to reduce the company’s carbon emissions and its reliance on scarce natural resources, as well as efforts to create a safe environment for people who use its solutions.

Transform your operations with a performance-based service model

Advancements in digital technology and the need for greater efficiency are driving change in baggage handling. As airports contend with increasing passenger volumes and rising expectations for seamless travel, effective end-to-end baggage operations are more critical than ever. Beyond choosing a baggage handling system and related technologies, true efficiency requires an optimal operation and maintenance strategy as well as the full and transparent collaboration of all stakeholders.

The role of energy optimisation in sustainable baggage handling

Energy usage is the most significant contributor to the carbon footprint of a Baggage Handling System. Let’s take a closer look at enhancing energy efficiency in existing and new baggage handling systems, supporting airports as they realise their roadmaps for a greener future.
